languages.text: {n}Высокий фактотум отделяется от остальной группы и приближается к вам, неустанно кланяясь.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, дозвольте мне похитить еще одно мгновение вашего времени... дело несколько щекотливое и касается трофеев, оставшихся после боев на палубах. Точнее, одного особенного трофея".

{n}The High Factotum breaks away from the rest and approaches you, bowing repeatedly.{/n} "Lord Captain, if I may steal just one more moment of your time... The matter is rather delicate, as it concerns trophies that were left after the battles on the ship. One trophy in particular, I should say."
languages.original_text: {n}Высокий фактотум отделяется от остальной группы и приближается к вам, неустанно кланяясь.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, дозвольте мне похитить еще одно мгновение вашего времени... дело несколько щекотливое и касается трофеев, оставшихся после боев на палубах. Точнее, одного особенного трофея".

traits.locale_text: {n}The High Factotum breaks away from the rest and approaches you, offering countless bows.{/n} "Lord Captain, if I may steal just one more moment of your time... The matter is rather delicate as it concerns the trophies that were left after the battles. One trophy in particular, I should say."

{n}The High Factotum breaks away from the rest and approaches you, offering countless bows.{/n} "Lord Captain, if I may steal just one more moment of your time... The matter is rather delicate as it concerns the trophies that were left after the battles. One trophy in particular, I should say."

{n}The High Factotum breaks away from the rest and approaches you, bowing repeatedly.{/n} "Lord Captain, if I may steal just one more moment of your time... The matter is rather delicate, as it concerns trophies that were left after the battles on the ship. One trophy in particular, I should say."

{n}The High Factotum breaks away from the rest and approaches you, bowing repeatedly.{/n} "Lord Captain, if I may steal just one more moment of your time... The matter is rather delicate, as it concerns trophies that were left after the battles on the ship. One trophy in particular, I should say."

{n}The High Factotum breaks away from the rest and approaches you, bowing repeatedly.{/n} "Lord Captain, if I may steal just one more moment of your time... The matter is rather delicate, as it concerns trophies that were left after the battles on the ship. One trophy in particular, I should say."

languages.text: {n}Das Hoch-Faktotum löst sich von den anderen und kommt sich immer wieder verneigend auf dich zu.{/n} "Lord Captain, dürfte ich Euch einen weiteren Moment Eurer Zeit stehlen? Die Angelegenheit ist recht delikat und betrifft Trophäen, die nach den Kämpfen auf dem Schiff verblieben sind. Eigentlich geht es um eine ganz bestimmte Trophäe."
languages.original_text: {n}The High Factotum breaks away from the rest and approaches you, bowing repeatedly.{/n} "Lord Captain, if I may steal just one more moment of your time... The matter is rather delicate, as it concerns trophies that were left after the battles on the ship. One trophy in particular, I should say."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Hoch-Faktotum löst sich von den anderen und kommt sich immer wieder verneigend auf dich zu.{/n} "Lord Captain, dürfte ich Euch einen weiteren Moment Eurer Zeit stehlen? Die Angelegenheit ist recht delikat und betrifft Trophäen, die nach den Kämpfen auf dem Schiff verblieben sind. Eigentlich geht es um eine ganz bestimmte Trophäe."

languages.text: {n}Le haut factotum se détache des autres et se dirige vers vous, en s'inclinant de manière répétée.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je vous prie de bien vouloir m'accorder un instant de votre temps... C'est une affaire assez délicate, qui concerne les trophées restés sur place après les combats à bord du vaisseau. Elle concerne un trophée en particulier, à vrai dire. »
languages.original_text: {n}The High Factotum breaks away from the rest and approaches you, bowing repeatedly.{/n} "Lord Captain, if I may steal just one more moment of your time... The matter is rather delicate, as it concerns trophies that were left after the battles on the ship. One trophy in particular, I should say."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le haut factotum se détache des autres et se dirige vers vous, en s'inclinant de manière répétée.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je vous prie de bien vouloir m'accorder un instant de votre temps... C'est une affaire assez délicate, qui concerne les trophées restés sur place après les combats à bord du vaisseau. Elle concerne un trophée en particulier, à vrai dire. »

languages.text: {n}高阶顾问立刻放下了手中的事情，向你走来，鞠了一躬。{/n}“舰长大人，请允许我再占用您一点时间……这件事情相当微妙，涉及到那场战斗之后留下的战利品。我应该说，是其中某件相当特别的战利品。”
languages.original_text: {n}The High Factotum breaks away from the rest and approaches you, bowing repeatedly.{/n} "Lord Captain, if I may steal just one more moment of your time... The matter is rather delicate, as it concerns trophies that were left after the battles on the ship. One trophy in particular, I should say."

traits.locale_text: {n}高阶顾问立刻放下了手中的事情，向你走来，鞠了一躬。{/n}“舰长大人，请允许我再占用您一点时间……这件事情相当微妙，涉及到那场战斗之后留下的战利品。我应该说，是其中某件相当特别的战利品。”

languages.text: {n}ハイ・ファクトタムは他の者から離れ、あなたに近づくと何度もお辞儀をした。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン。ほんの少しで構いませんので、お時間を頂けますでしょうか…。少しばかり繊細な問題でございまして。まあその、戦闘後に船に残された戦利品についてと申しますか、言うなればある特定の一品についてでございます」
languages.original_text: {n}The High Factotum breaks away from the rest and approaches you, bowing repeatedly.{/n} "Lord Captain, if I may steal just one more moment of your time... The matter is rather delicate, as it concerns trophies that were left after the battles on the ship. One trophy in particular, I should say."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハイ・ファクトタムは他の者から離れ、あなたに近づくと何度もお辞儀をした。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン。ほんの少しで構いませんので、お時間を頂けますでしょうか…。少しばかり繊細な問題でございまして。まあその、戦闘後に船に残された戦利品についてと申しますか、言うなればある特定の一品についてでございます」

languages.text: {n}El Sumo Factótum se separa del resto y se acerca a ti, ofreciéndote innumerables reverencias.{/n} «Lord Capitán, si me permite robarle un momento más de su tiempo... El asunto es bastante delicado, ya que concierne a los trofeos que quedaron tras las batallas en la nave. Un trofeo en particular, debería decir».
languages.original_text: {n}The High Factotum breaks away from the rest and approaches you, bowing repeatedly.{/n} "Lord Captain, if I may steal just one more moment of your time... The matter is rather delicate, as it concerns trophies that were left after the battles on the ship. One trophy in particular, I should say."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Alto Factotum se separa del resto y se acerca a ti, ofreciéndote innumerables reverencias.{/n} «Lord Capitán, si me permite robarle un momento más de su tiempo... El asunto es bastante delicado, ya que concierne a los trofeos que quedaron tras las batallas en la nave. Un trofeo en particular, debería decir».

languages.text: {n}Arşıkâhya diğerlerinden ayrılıp defalarca eğilerek sana yaklaşıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, izninizle bir dakikanızı daha alacağım. Mesele oldukça hassas. Gemideki çatışmalardan kalan ganimetlerle ilgili. Daha doğrusu bir ganimetle ilgili."
languages.original_text: {n}The High Factotum breaks away from the rest and approaches you, bowing repeatedly.{/n} "Lord Captain, if I may steal just one more moment of your time... The matter is rather delicate, as it concerns trophies that were left after the battles on the ship. One trophy in particular, I should say."
